DataElement.preferredName: Pre-Exposure Therapeutic Procedure SARS Coronavirus 2 Administered Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe the pre-exposure therapy that was administered for COVID-19.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Exposure Therapeutic Procedure SARS Coronavirus 2 Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
